item.title: golang解析json
item.description: golang解析json常用的方法有2种 定义struct package main import ( "encoding/json" "fmt" ) type Student struct { Name string `json:"Name"` Age int `json:"Age"` Sex string `json:"Sex"` } type Class struct { ClassName string `json:"ClassName"` Students []Student } type School struct { SchoolName string Id int64 `json:"Id"` Class map[string]Class
